name: Hyperfocus
description:
This project was created for a class at UC Santa Cruz as a way to see a glimpse of the feeling of being overwhelmed and the stress that people with ADHD face everyday. For more details, read the  Medium article about it below:

https://medium.com/power-and-representation-2020-new-creativity/hyperfocus-a-gam...

Huge thanks to https://itch.io/profile/260qse for helping as a consultant!
